Prominent Pakistani social media account: 2. Pakistani journalist Wajahat Saeed Khan tweeted about the change in command and questioned whether the previous Air Marshal was fired or simply on a golfing trip.
Another Pakistani journalist: Omar Quraishi, also claimed that the Indian government had sacked Air Marshal C H Kumar.
Alt News: a fact-checking website, found that the information about the sacking of Air Marshal Chandrashekharan Hari Kumar was false. The Ministry of Defence stated that his departure was due to retirement after a long and illustrious career.
